title: shrxkt
author: shrxkt
created_time: May 11, 2022, 04:41:25 PMLast edit: May 15, 2022, 03:13:22 PM by shrxkt

comments.author: aioc
comments.body: Are you accusing or just sharing your experience I don't see a point why it should be posted here this is a scam accusation it should be in the gambling discussion since this is a gambling-related topic or on reputation.They just find you annoying so they blocked you but blocking doesn't have anything to do with scams unless there is money involved.I checked one review and they have fair reviews they even mentioned good customer supporthttps://www.legitgamblingsites.com/5dimes/

comments.author: holydarkness
comments.body: I read your entire post yesterday and tried to give it a good night sleep and re-read them again today in hope for a new perspective. And the impression I get still the same as last night:Where exactly on your narrative is the scam attempt happen? I haven't read or do any DD on 5Dimes, just a glance at their website, and although the website looks... worrying, based on your narrative --unless you can provide further info and evidence on whichnpoimt amd what form does the scam happen-- the impression I get from both time is that this is a simple case of Karen. And no, not only when you pull the card to[ask for manager, it's from the exact point where you demanded something so technical about 30% discount.Forgive me if I'm wrong, I have no idea about gambling terms at all, but wasn't what you insisting are explained here already?The way I see it, you're being banned for wasting their time with 2 hours of chat, spamming their helpdesk by asking on multiple chat topic, and ultimately asking something rather personal and completely not related to the topic in discussion.

comments.author: coin-investor
comments.body: Quote from: holydarkness on May 12, 2022, 11:20:24 AMThe way I see it, you're being banned for wasting their time with 2 hours of chat, spamming their helpdesk by asking on multiple chat topic, and ultimately asking something rather personal and completely not related to the topic in discussion.OP should not take it personally and try to get revenge by posting something allegation that he cannot back up I still can't see the proof and you are an injustice to 5Dimes, don't feed your ego they blocked you because you are so annoying to them and when you are communicating with the support you should take on the issue and not asking other things besides your issue, and unless you have proven them to be a scam from reviews from other sources you should not compare them to your experience.

comments.author: Pmalek
comments.body: A support staff banning your from the casino's chat is not a scam. Your feelings and opinions that Max might be an Indian who is a scammer waiting for you to deposit money so he can confiscate them is also not a scam. The only thing that happened here is that you got banned from accessing the chat by someone who has the power to do so. Maybe he didn't have to do it, but you also didn't have to go off-topic and talk about Luna or Terra. 5Dimes did not scam you, case closed.
